name: ACM at UCSD
description: I manage a team of 4 backend engineers using agile project management system to maintain the organization website used by 3000+ users. I created 2 realtime graphs using metabase and SQL query calls to track the average attendance of events for each weeks in a quarter, and I implemented 10 feature functions, 3 APIs, and 2 testing functions under Typescript to allow the users to submit their resumes to the organization website and the recruiters to fetch their resumes.

name: UCSD CSE Department
position: Computer Science and Engineering Instructional Assistant
description: I host lab sessions 5 hrs/wk to assist students from the system programming course in learning course materials; provide constructive feedbacks to students’ programming assignments based on c and assembly language; and answer students’ questions and confusions about the course material on Piazza, an online forum for academic discussions.

name: Newport Robotics Group
description: I led a team of three people to create a mobile application using Xamarin.Forms framework. This app, used by our robotics team of around 100 people, was able to track the perfomances of more than 3000 different robots at FIRST Robotics Competition and allowed our team to come up with winning strategies. It was published on Google Play to increase the accessibility of the application.
